ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Heat soup gently over low heat and thin with a splash of milk or water if too thick
Toast bread until golden and crispy to provide structural support for the creamy mixture
Arrange sliced eggs decoratively on toast before topping with tuna-mushroom mixture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the simplest preparation that feels satisfying? How do you prevent creamed tuna from becoming too thick on toast?
